amendment.description: An amendment numbered 136 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit funds appropriated by this Act to implement certain executive orders regarding climate change.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A078) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A078) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A078) Agreed to by voice vote.
